message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can always adjust in the next rounds if you think it's unfair.
I think a 60/40 split is fair to start. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's go with 70/30.  If we keep going back and forth, we'll both lose a lot of money to inflation.
